title: Macos Install Hugo Env

content:
1. Edit Article YAML Add hidden: true in the article yaml section
--- title: "Article Title" date: lastmod: author: hidden: true --- 2. Hide Article IN Article List Page File Path : \layouts_default\list.html
Insert {{ if not .Params.hidden }}{{- end }} to the specified position
{{ if not .Params.hidden }}<!-- hidden-md-edit begin --> <article class="{{ $class }}"> <div class="post-info"> <header class="entry-header"> <h2> {{- .Title }} {{- if .Draft }}<sup><span class="entry-isdraft">&nbsp;&nbsp;[draft]</span></sup>{{- end }} </h2> </header> {{- if (ne (.Param "hideSummary") true) }} <section class="entry-content"> <p> {{- if .Description }} {{ .Description }} {{- end }} <!-- {{ .Summary | plainify | htmlUnescape }} --> {{ if .Truncated }}...{{ end }} </p> </section> {{- end }} {{- if not (.Param "hideMeta") }} <footer class="entry-footer"> {{- partial "post_meta.html" . -}} </footer> {{- end }} </div> {{- $isHidden := (.Site.Params.cover.hidden | default .Site.Params.cover.hiddenInList) }} {{- partial "cover.html" (dict "cxt" . "IsHome" true "isHidden" $isHidden) }} <a class="entry-link" aria-label="post link to {{ .Title | plainify }}" href="{{ .Permalink }}"></a> </article> {{- end }} {{- end }}<!-- hidden-md-edit end --> 3. Archives 3.1 Hidden In Archives File Path : \layouts\_default\archives.html
<div class="archive-posts"> {{- range .Pages }} {{- if not .Params.hidden }} <!-- Hidden-In-Archive Begin --> {{- if eq .Kind "page" }} <div class="archive-entry"> <h3 class="archive-entry-title"> {{- .Title | markdownify }} {{- if .Draft }}<sup><span class="entry-isdraft">&nbsp;&nbsp;[draft]</span></sup>{{- end }} </h3> <div class="archive-meta"> {{- partial "post_meta.html" . -}} </div> <a class="entry-link" aria-label="post link to {{ .Title | plainify }}" href="{{ .Permalink }}"></a> </div> {{- end }} {{- end }} {{- end }}<!-- Hidden-In-Archive End --> </div> 3.2 Not Count Hidden Article Year Counts <!-- <h2 class="archive-year-header">{{- replace .Key "0001" "" }} <sup class="archive-count">&nbsp;&nbsp;{{ len .Pages }}</sup> </h2> --> <!-- éšè—çš„æ–‡ç« ä¸ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°é‡ --> <h2 class="archive-year-header"> {{- replace .Key "0001" "" }} <sup class="archive-count">&nbsp;&nbsp; {{- $visibleCount := 0 -}} {{- range .Pages }} {{- if not .Params.hidden }} {{- $visibleCount = add $visibleCount 1 -}} {{- end }} {{- end -}} {{- $visibleCount }} </sup> </h2> Month Counts <!-- æŒ‰ç…§æœˆä»½ç»Ÿè®¡æ–‡ç« æ•°é‡ --> <!-- <h3 class="archive-month-header"> {{- .Key }}<sup class="archive-count">&nbsp;&nbsp;{{ len .Pages }}</sup> </h3> --> <h3 class="archive-month-header"> {{- .Key }} <sup class="archive-count">&nbsp;&nbsp; <!-- ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºä¸ç»Ÿè®¡éšè—æ–‡ç« ï¼ˆæŒ‰æœˆä»½ç»Ÿè®¡â€”ï¼‰ --> {{- $visibleCount := 0 -}} {{- range .Pages }} {{- if not .Params.hidden }} {{- $visibleCount = add $visibleCount 1 -}} {{- end }} {{- end -}} {{- $visibleCount }} </sup> </h3>
summary:
1. Edit Article YAML

Add hidden: true in the article yaml section

---
title: "Article Title"
date: 
lastmod: 
author: 
hidden: true
---

2. Hide Article IN Article List Page

File Path : \layouts_default\list.html

Insert {{ if not .Params.hidden }}{{- end }} to the specified position


{{ if not .Params.hidden }}<!-- hidden-md-edit begin -->

<article class="{{ $class }}">
  <div class="post-info">
    <header class="entry-header">
      <h2>
        {{- .Title }}
        {{- if .Draft }}<sup><span class="entry-isdraft">  [draft]</span></sup>{{- end }}
      </h2>
    </header>
    {{- if (ne (.Param "hideSummary") true) }}
    <section class="entry-content">
      <p>
        {{- if .Description }}
        {{ .Description }}
        {{- end }}
        <!-- {{ .Summary | plainify | htmlUnescape }} -->
        {{ if .Truncated }}...{{ end }}
      </p>
    </section>
    {{- end }}
    {{- if not (.Param "hideMeta") }}
    <footer class="entry-footer">
      {{- partial "post_meta.html" . -}}
    </footer>
    {{- end }}
  </div>
  {{- $isHidden := (.Site.Params.cover.hidden | default .Site.Params.cover.hiddenInList) }}
  {{- partial "cover.html" (dict "cxt" . "IsHome" true "isHidden" $isHidden) }}
  <a class="entry-link" aria-label="post link to {{ .Title | plainify }}" href="{{ .Permalink }}"></a>
</article>
{{- end }}

{{- end }}<!-- hidden-md-edit end -->

3. Archives

3.1 Hidden In Archives

File Path : \layouts\_default\archives.html
